plan class description

Source: R/plan.R
Plan.Rd

An argset is: - a set of arguments

Details

An analysis is: - one argset - one function

A plan is: - one data pull - a list of analyses

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Plan$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
